latest_articles.title: Rēzekne mayor not cleared to access state secrets
latest_articles.summary: Information from the State Security Service suggests that Aleksandrs Bartaševičs (Together for Latvia), Rēzekne's mayor, has been denied access to state secrets necessary for work to the  LSM.lv reports.

latest_articles.title: Belarusian balloons full of cigarettes pose NATO’s latest security threat
latest_articles.summary: A rising number of incursions into NATO airspace has led some officials to allege an escalation of Russian hybrid attacks against the alliance and the European Union.
